name: endow
description: A minimalistic, yet powerful, class based mixin utility.

scripts.build: npm run cjs && npm run bundle && npm run min && npm test && npm run size
scripts.size: cat index.js | wc -c;cat min.js | wc -c;gzip -c9 min.js | wc -c;cat min.js | brotli | wc -c && rm -f min.js.br

author: Andrea Giammarchi
